title: Unit 8: Our Favourite Food
grammarTopics: First Conditional - Questions and Short Answers

theory.brief: Câu điều kiện loại 1 nói về tình huống có thể xảy ra trong tương lai. Cấu trúc: If + present simple, will/won't + base verb. Mệnh đề if luôn dùng present simple (không dùng will).
examples: If we buy some biscuits, we'll have something for the party.
If you eat healthy food, you will be strong.
Will you go to sleep if you get tired? - Yes, I will.

exercises.question: If we __________ some biscuits, we'll have something for the party.
exercises.explanation: Trong mệnh đề if, dùng present simple (không dùng will)
hints: (buy) - Present simple trong mệnh đề if

exercises.question: If you __________ healthy food, you will be strong.
exercises.explanation: Present simple trong mệnh đề if

exercises.question: If we __________ home now, we'll have time to make a cake.
exercises.explanation: Dùng present simple sau 'if'

exercises.question: If you __________ well, you won't get all the vitamins.
exercises.explanation: Negative present simple trong mệnh đề if

exercises.question: If it __________ tomorrow, we won't go to the park.
exercises.explanation: Third person singular: thêm -s

exercises.question: If we take a home-made fruit cake, we __________ have to eat unhealthy food.
exercises.explanation: Mệnh đề chính dùng won't (negative result)

exercises.question: If you eat healthy food, you __________ be strong and have lots of energy.
exercises.explanation: Mệnh đề chính dùng will (positive result)

exercises.question: If you don't eat well, you __________ get ill very often.
exercises.explanation: Kết quả với will

exercises.question: If you're tired, you __________ do as well at school.
exercises.explanation: Kết quả phủ định

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp câu: If I / see John tonight / I / tell him the news
exercises.correctSentence: If I see John tonight I will tell him the news
acceptedAnswers: If I see John tonight I will tell him the news
If I see John tonight I will tell him the news.
If I see John tonight, I will tell him the news
If I see John tonight, I'll tell him the news
hints: If + present simple, will + base verb

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp câu: If you / not study / you / not pass the test
exercises.correctSentence: If you don't study you won't pass the test
acceptedAnswers: If you don't study you won't pass the test
If you don't study you won't pass the test.
If you don't study, you won't pass the test

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp câu: If it / be sunny tomorrow / we / go to the beach
exercises.correctSentence: If it is sunny tomorrow we will go to the beach
acceptedAnswers: If it is sunny tomorrow we will go to the beach
If it is sunny tomorrow we will go to the beach.
If it is sunny tomorrow, we will go to the beach
If it's sunny tomorrow, we'll go to the beach

exercises.instruction: Đổi thứ tự: If we buy some biscuits, we'll have something for the party → We'll have something...
exercises.correctSentence: We'll have something for the party if we buy some biscuits
acceptedAnswers: We'll have something for the party if we buy some biscuits
We'll have something for the party if we buy some biscuits.
We will have something for the party if we buy some biscuits
hints: Không có dấu phзапятой khi mệnh đề will đứng trước

exercises.instruction: Đổi thứ tự: You will be strong if you eat healthy food → If you eat...
exercises.correctSentence: If you eat healthy food you will be strong
acceptedAnswers: If you eat healthy food you will be strong
If you eat healthy food you will be strong.
If you eat healthy food, you will be strong
If you eat healthy food, you'll be strong
hints: Có dấu phẩy khi mệnh đề if đứng trước

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp câu hỏi: you / pass the exam / if / you / study hard?
exercises.correctSentence: Will you pass the exam if you study hard
acceptedAnswers: Will you pass the exam if you study hard
Will you pass the exam if you study hard?
If you study hard, will you pass the exam?
If you study hard will you pass the exam
hints: Will + subject + verb + if + present simple?

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp câu hỏi: they / come to the party / if / we / invite them?
exercises.correctSentence: Will they come to the party if we invite them
acceptedAnswers: Will they come to the party if we invite them
Will they come to the party if we invite them?
If we invite them, will they come to the party?
If we invite them will they come to the party

exercises.instruction: Sắp xếp câu hỏi: what / you / do / if / it / rain tomorrow?
exercises.correctSentence: What will you do if it rains tomorrow
acceptedAnswers: What will you do if it rains tomorrow
What will you do if it rains tomorrow?
If it rains tomorrow, what will you do?
If it rains tomorrow what will you do

exercises.question: Will you go to sleep if you get tired? → Yes, __________
exercises.explanation: Câu trả lời ngắn khẳng định: Yes, I will (KHÔNG dùng contraction)

exercises.question: Will they come if we invite them? → No, __________
exercises.explanation: Câu trả lời ngắn phủ định

exercises.question: Will she be happy if you call her? → Yes, __________
exercises.explanation: Yes, she will (không viết tắt trong câu trả lời ngắn khẳng định)

exercises.question: If it rains tomorrow, we __________ to the beach.
exercises.explanation: Hợp lý: nếu mưa, sẽ không đi biển

exercises.question: If you __________ hard, you'll pass the exam.
exercises.explanation: Dùng present simple trong mệnh đề if, không dùng will

exercises.question: We'll arrive on time if we __________ now.
exercises.explanation: Present simple sau if
hints: Không dùng will trong mệnh đề if

exercises.question: __________ you help me if I ask you?
exercises.explanation: Câu hỏi điều kiện loại 1 bắt đầu bằng Will

exercises.question: Sửa lỗi: 'If you will eat healthy food, you will be strong.'
options: If you eat healthy food, you will be strong
If you will eat healthy food, you will be strong
If you ate healthy food, you will be strong
If you eat healthy food, you are strong
exercises.explanation: Không dùng will trong mệnh đề if, dùng present simple

exercises.question: Sửa lỗi: 'If we go home now, we have time to make a cake.'
options: If we go home now, we'll have time to make a cake
If we go home now, we have time to make a cake
If we will go home now, we have time to make a cake
If we went home now, we have time to make a cake
exercises.explanation: Mệnh đề chính cần will/won't

exercises.question: Sửa lỗi: 'If it will rain tomorrow, we won't go out.'
options: If it rains tomorrow, we won't go out
If it will rain tomorrow, we won't go out
If it rained tomorrow, we won't go out
If it rain tomorrow, we won't go out
exercises.explanation: Không dùng will trong mệnh đề if

exercises.question: Sửa lỗi: 'If you don't study, you don't pass the exam.'
options: If you don't study, you won't pass the exam
If you don't study, you don't pass the exam
If you won't study, you don't pass the exam
If you didn't study, you don't pass the exam
exercises.explanation: Mệnh đề chính cần will/won't cho kết quả tương lai

exercises.question: Sửa lỗi: 'We'll miss the bus if we won't hurry.'
options: We'll miss the bus if we don't hurry
We'll miss the bus if we won't hurry
We'll miss the bus if we didn't hurry
We miss the bus if we don't hurry
exercises.explanation: Mệnh đề if dùng present simple negative (don't), không dùng won't
hints: Đổi 'won't' thành 'don't' trong mệnh đề if

exercises.question: Sửa lỗi: 'If you eat well you will be healthy.' (thiếu dấu câu)
options: If you eat well, you will be healthy
If you eat well you will be healthy
If, you eat well you will be healthy
If you eat, well you will be healthy
exercises.explanation: Cần dấu phẩy sau mệnh đề if khi nó đứng trước
